project.title: web developer portfolio
project.description: From the Web components and the real-time server with React.JS, Mongo, Meteor, and more, discover my latest web development portfolio projects.

MyBeCode.intro: MyBeCode is an intranet that allows you to manage the entire administrative side of Becode learner management
MyBeCode.about: The idea of this project was to simplify our administrative tasks by automating as many things as possible via a platform where our juniors could fill in their absences, events, badges or others by themselves. The platform was continuously developed and the functionalities were added as the project progressed.
MyBeCode.technicalDescription: Platform continuously developed over 1.5 years. All information is accessible in real time and is therefore used by all of BeCode (600 people).

Talent.intro: This platform and there to connect learners and external recruiters.
Talent.about: Any company can register on the platform, configure its profile to add different information (number of employees, photos, job offers,...) and create contacts with Becode juniors. Once in anonymous contact, the company can ask for more access to juniors and only if it accepts it, it has the information. Once in anonymous contact, the company can ask for more access to juniors and only if it accepts it, it has the information.
Talent.technicalDescription: This platform has been developed in direct relationship with MyBeCode since all information flows from one side to the other. The two applications are on the same server and run on the same database.

Rexel.intro: This platform allows you to configure charging stations for electric cars.
Rexel.about: There are a large number of parameters to take into account when buying an electric car, including the type of terminals to be installed. To simplify the choice of installers, this application allows you to enter all the important parameters and to target the terminal(s) compatible with the customer's current installation
Rexel.technicalDescription: Redux takes a very important place. Since all parameters are linked to each other, it is therefore essential to synchronize the configuration in all components. The whole awning is therefore also synchronized with the local storage room so that it can keep its configuration and not lose all its work with improper handling.

Musics.intro: This platform is there to make sure that a group can have the same music at the same time.
Musics.about: Each person can join the group and everyone can choose the sound that is being listened to in the same way as some nightclubs with headphones. It is also possible to add sounds that come from SoundCloud. You can connect to it and create your own playlists
Musics.technicalDescription: The application is developed with React and Meteor to ensure a real-time database

Isaac.intro: It's a small multiplayer game based on an existing game.
Isaac.about: This little game was developed in NodeJs and SocketIO, it was developed as part of node es6 learning. Several things still need to be improved significantly, create a database to save the different profiles. We should also push the display and make sure that we can play with more people at the same time. Allow to make different game show,...
Isaac.technicalDescription: The game was code with NodeJS ES6 and socket io for the server and the client is developed with Canva

CryptoSpace.intro: A small application that allows you to imagine the different links in the blockchain environment
CryptoSpace.about: Some companies including some employees who work in the blockchain environment and who are graphically represented with their different links between them or with other companies.
CryptoSpace.technicalDescription: The information is in a JS file and a recursive loop allows you to create all your relationships
